backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that manages testimonials with add, get by ID, and get all operations using a Map data structure.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five features related to converting the eagle logo to circular shape with neon styling, glow effects, animations, and responsive design.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-existing summaries of all frontend component files describing the SwiftOps Automation website sections, styling, and interactive effects.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors, borders, and component styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx with viewport meta tags and page title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that assembles the full page layout with navbar, all content sections, footer, and neon cursor effect.
frontend/src/components/AIPerformanceSec: Section displaying four animated performance metrics cards, a testimonial quote, and a workflow visualization image with animated pulse nodes.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section with glassmorphism cards showing name, phone, WhatsApp (with green glow), Instagram, and email with responsive text handling and scroll animations.
frontend/src/components/EagleClickAnimat: Renders a full-screen eagle logo animation with multiple stages (fade, draw, expand, particles, pulse, scale, fadeout) triggered by an isActive prop, completing after ~3.8 seconds.
frontend/src/components/EagleLogo.tsx: Displays a robotic eagle logo in a circular container with animated neon glow effects, breathing animations, and hover interactions; plays a one-time activation animation on first load tracked via sessionStorage.
frontend/src/components/EliteClientProfi: Displays a grid of three client testimonial cards with profile images, names, positions, and quotes; uses intersection observer for fade-in animations on scroll.
Renders a call-to-action section with a headline, email input form, and submit button with ripple effect for capturing user emails.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a comprehensive footer with brand info, link columns (Company, Services, Resources, Legal), social media icons, contact details, and copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with parallax background, animated grid, floating particles, eagle logo, headline text, and CTA buttons that trigger the eagle click animation before scrolling to target sections.
frontend/src/components/HowItWorksSectio: Displays a three-step process section explaining how the automation platform works, with animated cards showing Connect, Deploy, and Scale steps using intersection observer for scroll animations.
frontend/src/components/IntegrationsSect: Shows a horizontally scrolling marquee of integration logos (Slack, Google Workspace, etc.) with glass-card styling and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Main navigation bar with logo, desktop/mobile menus, active section highlighting, and eagle animation on navigation clicks with ripple effects.
frontend/src/components/NeonCursor.tsx: Custom cursor component that displays a neon glow effect following the mouse on desktop devices only.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Empty file placeholder for pricing section component.
Grid layout displaying six service cards (AI Agents, Chatbots, Email Automation, etc.) with icons, descriptions, and staggered fade-in animations.
frontend/src/components/StatsSection.tsx: Statistics section showing four animated counters (tasks automated, integrations, uptime, clients) with neon styling and intersection-triggered animations.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Empty file placeholder for testimonials section component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActiveSection.ts: Custom hook that tracks which section is currently visible in the viewport using IntersectionObserver to highlight active navigation links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages ICP backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, automatically invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCounterAnimation.t: Custom hook that animates a number from 0 to a target value over a specified duration using requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntersectionObserv: Generic hook that returns whether an element is intersecting the viewport based on configurable threshold and root margin options.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Custom React hook that tracks scroll position and returns a parallax offset value based on a configurable speed multiplier.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for React Query hooks; currently empty as no backend queries are needed for the static website.
frontend/src/hooks/useRippleEffect.ts: Custom React hook that creates a Material Design-style ripple effect on click events by dynamically adding and removing a ripple span element.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining Tailwind configuration, CSS custom properties for theming, neon cyan color utilities, and futuristic button/text effects with glowing animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom neon colors, dark backgrounds, Orbitron/Inter fonts, and accordion animations using tailwindcss-animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking features and requirements, primarily focused on converting the eagle logo to a circular design with neon effects and removing email addresses from the header.
